item.title: 【How to Build an AI-Powered Chatbot With Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Using LangGraph】如何使用langgraph构建具有检索型发电（RAG）的AI驱动聊天机器人
item.description:

Why RAG?

Large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 can produce fluent, grammatically accurate text; however, without access to external, updated knowledge, they frequently hallucinate or fabricate facts. This turns into a prime issue in high-stakes environments — like legal, medical, or business enterprise contexts — in which accuracy and accept as true with are non-negotiable.

Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) resolves this problem by fetching relevant, trusted information from your own knowledge base (e.g., documents, PDFs, internal databases) and injecting it into the LLM prompt. This method grounds the model`s outputs, dramatically lowering hallucinations whilst tailoring responses to your domain.

item.title: 【Design Automation in Closure Engineering: Building Parametric Assemblies With CATIA and VB Scripting】封闭工程中的设计自动化：使用CATIA和VB脚本的构建参数组件
item.description:
【

Modern closure systems in EVs and advanced vehicles demand more than just clean geometry; they require embedded logic, constraint-driven structures, and validation-aware modeling. While CATIA V5/V6 offers robust 3D capabilities, its true power emerges when engineers start treating CAD like code. With VB scripting, it is possible to encode design intelligence directly into the CAD model, enabling parametric automation across complex mechanical assemblies.

This article breaks down how parametric automation can reduce review-cycle fatigue, enforce design intent, and enable a traceable, simulation-ready closure workflow.

】

电动汽车和高级车辆中的现代封闭系统不仅仅是干净的几何形状，还需要更多。他们需要嵌入式逻辑，约束驱动的结构和验证感知建模。尽管Catia V5/V6具有强大的3D功能，但当工程师开始像代码一样将CAD处理时，它的真实功能就会出现。通过VB脚本，可以将设计智能直接编码到CAD模型中，从而在复杂的机械组件上实现参数自动化。

本文分解了参数自动化如何减少审核周期疲劳，强制设计意图，并启用可追溯的，可进行模拟的闭合工作流程。
